text: Tadera rasulagana tadera balechilena, ''satya bate amara tomadera mato manusa ba'i to na'i, kintu allah tamra bandadera madhye theke yake icche karena tara prati anugraha barsana karena. Ara amadera jan'ya eti naya ye allahâ€Œra anumati byatita tomadera kache kono pramana niye asaba. Ata'eba allahâ€Œra upare'i tabe muminara nirbhara karuka.
